name: div
features: Ergonomic Design : Engineered for a personalized fit & maximum protection
Gel-to-Shell® Technology : Air-activated material transforms from a malleable gel into a customized, form-fitting shield in 30 minutes
Dispersion Technology : Impact disperses across the entire guard for efficient & even protection
Custom Molding Gear : Provides a one-to-one, tailored fit using Gel-to-Shell® Technology
Comfort Lining : Moisture-wicking interior improves feel & comfort during wear
3D Cloud Mesh : Raised-texture base material enhances both style & structure
Left Hand Hitter/Right Hand Hitter : LH Hitter option is for left-handed batters (guard worn on right hand/leg); RH Hitter is for right-handed batters (guard worn on left hand/leg)
